body_html:
ExponentialMovingAverage could be applied either on original variables or on output tensors. It's different from user-defined variables.
If the slot_creator will be replaced in design, there should be a direction for how to maintain averages on mid-output first. (as ppwwyyxx mentioned case)

ExponentialMovingAverage could be applied either on original variables or on output tensors. It's different from user-defined variables.
If the slot_creator will be replaced in design, there should be a direction for how to maintain averages on mid-output first. (as ppwwyyxx mentioned case)
body:
ExponentialMovingAverage could be applied either on original variables or on output tensors. It's different from user-defined variables.
If the slot_creator will be replaced in design, there should be a direction for how to maintain averages on mid-output first. (as ppwwyyxx mentioned case)
